title: Key Fragments
body: So how does the honor update exactly drop key fragments?  Like is it by how many times you've been honored in a spam of time or is it just a over all time spam of a couple days?

replies.body:
The number of Honours you receive should have no effect on the Key Fragment drop rate. It occurs based on your Honour level (level 2+ has standard drop rates, level 1 has drastically reduced drop rate and level 0 has no drop rate) and whether you're actually playing (as in, you need to play a match to be able to get a Key Fragment, though not necessarily win). The Key Fragments are still given out based on a "month-by-month" basis, it's just been changed so the drops are more spread out over the month rather than mostly at the start, as it was previously.

As long as you meet the requirements, you should randomly receive a notification that you've received a Key Fragment while using the client (though it appears it might be mostly upon starting up the client at the moment).
